line_1: TO you, whose groves protect the feather'd quires,
line_2: To you, whom pity moves, and taste inspires,

line_1: And Wolves with Howling fill the sacred Quires.
line_2: The Fox obscene to gaping Tombs retires,

line_1: DESCEND, ye hovering Sylphs! aerial Quires,
line_2: And sweep with little hands your silver lyres;
